0.content: Blake and his family head to a wonderful vacation getaway, but trouble can't seem to get away from Blake. What kind of shrinking trouble happens when Blake tries to relax?~
0.title: Small Bargain Vacation!

...a dark cloud formation in the distant sky!
...Ruby and some other girls heading to the volleyball court!
03.content:
Blake Heart, his sister Jade, and their mother Claire had just arrived at the beach for a nice, long seaside vacation. The family set up some beach chairs, towels, and an umbrella on the sun-kissed sand. Blake sat himself on one of the chairs under their umbrella, when...

"Blake, honey, your sister and I are going to get some lunch. Want anything?" Claire asked her son.

"No thanks, I'm fine..." Blake replied, before his sister and mother walked off to the nearby boardwalk for a good meal.

Looking forward, the mage watched the small waves of the ocean ahead. To his left, he noticed an occupied lifeguard tower, and to his right, a vacant volleyball court. Blake figured he might get bored to tears if nothing out of the ordinary occurred before his mom and sister returned from the boardwalk...

As if fate was out to spite him, Blake saw his surroundings become bigger by the second. Was he having a shrinking episode?

"No, not again..!" By the time Blake finished speaking, he had already been reduced to the all-too-familiar size of half an inch. At least he was still in the shade.

Just when his day couldn't get any stranger, the shrunken young man looked to his left and saw...
03.title: Beachside Shrinking

031.content:
Aria! Blake's girlfriend for the last 5 years was there right beside him. Well still some ways off. How had he not seen her before? And what were the chances of her being at the same beach in the same place at the same time as he was? Questions he wondered but didn't need answers to at the moment. Blake looked upon her resting form.

Aria was resting in a yellow bikini, long strands connected to her bra piece that wound under her arm and sloped behind her back. Her chest the size of massive hills and her face resembling a stoic mountain. She was wearing sunglasses and a frilly yellow sunhat. Her skin was glazed slightly from sweat and the murky substance of what Blake could only assume was sunscreen. His eyes wandering down her body he found a similarly designed bikini bottom, her body the same all over. A unique feature that caught Blake's eyes, however, were her turquoise painted toes.

It seemed that Aria was catching a tan unaware of her shrunken boyfriend in need of her assistance. Blake looked over her one last time before affirming that the person who would help him would be Aria herself, just as she had done when he first tried to impress her.

Blake knew what he had to do. He was going to try and get his girlfriend's attention. Lookin out of the shade, a sea of hot sand awaited him. Blake groaned softly that he would have to cross a mini desert, but it beat being trapped alone at the beach. Setting out, Blake walked out of the shade and felt the blazing heat upon his diminished form. Blake covered his eyes and set out toward his resting girlfriend.

After a few minutes of walking, he finally arrived at the towel of his girlfriend. Blake panted and clambered up and onto the cloth plane. As he regained his breath, he stared in awe at the sheer scale of his slumbering lover. It was enough to make Blake blush. He looked over and thought of a few ways to get her attention. He knew that the simplest way would be to climb onto her chest and wave her down, but from the sound of things, it seemed as if she were totally asleep. He could go to her face, but that in itself posed some dangers of being accidentally swallowed. Another way to get her attention would be to try and tickle her feet, something that had worked in the past when he was small though getting smothered and rubbed into hot sand wasn't appealing either, nor was getting stuck between her toes, clean as they were. Blake thinks for a moment and decides to go to...
031.title: ...his girlfriend, Aria, laying on her towel an...

05.title: Travelling Abroad?

051.content:
“We’re taking a vacation in Mexico?!” Jade was unable to conceal her excitement.

Blake, on the other hand, was a bit nervous. “Um, Mom...I’m not too familiar with the local language...”

“Not to worry!” The siblings’ mother, Claire, smiled. “I’ll bring along a Spanish-to-English dictionary for you. I for one am looking forward to trying some delicious Mexican cuisine!”

After a few more days, the Heart family was packed and ready to drive to New Opal Airport. Security was surprisingly easy (even with Blake being a mage), and soon enough the family boarded the plane, looking forward to a nice week abroad.

...

To Blake, it didn’t seem like a long time had passed between the departure from New Opal and arrival in Mexico. The Hearts retrieved their luggage and drove a rental car to a luxurious-looking hotel, checking in and heading to their room not long after.

Just then...

“Whoops!” Claire interjected. “Forgot something in the hotel lobby. Jade and I will go look for it.”

Blake blinked, not often the one to have a hotel room to himself. “Ok, Mom. I’ll just chill in here!”

The two ladies exited the room to search for whatever they’d forgotten, while Blake picked up the TV remote and began to surf through channels. This period of quiet was cut short by a knock at the door. Turning off the TV, the young man walked over and answered the door...
051.title: A Mage in Mexico

choices: Blake is shrunken during the flight
Blake is shrunken at the hotel
052.content:
"Oh. My. Gosh!" Blake couldn't mask his excitement.

"We're going to Japan?!" Jade interjected, just as eager as her brother.

"That's right, kids!" The siblings' mother, Claire, confirmed. "The branch of Jengain where I work is participating in a foreign exchange program for all of next week. We've been arranged to stay at a nice hotel in Tokyo!"

A sudden thought occurred to Blake, replacing his excitement with nervousness. "W-wait...I don't think I know the Japanese language!"

Claire patted her son on the head. "Don't worry. I've been provided several copies of a Japanese/English dictionary. No language barrier can hinder the Heart family!"

That Saturday, the family arrived at New Opal Airport, their suitcases packed with a week's worth of toiletries, clothes, and...snacks. Lots of snacks. Security was a breeze for the three, and in little time at all, every bit of luggage was accounted for. Blake, Jade, and Claire soon boarded the plane, looking forward to seven whole days in Japan.
052.title: Jengain's Jump to Japan

"I see you made it to the airport."

Blake turned to identify the owner of the voice and had a big smile on his face. The owner of the voice was his cousin, Sapphire, who smiled and waved, "Hey, kiddo." "I didn't know you were coming!" Blake almost shouted, earning a laugh from his cousin as he hugged her.

"Aunt Jessica!" Jade announced happily as she went over to hug the woman. Jessica chuckled, "Hey, hun." "I see you're doing well." Claire smiled. The woman smiled, "I am. How about you?" Claire nodded, "Good."

"We should get seated." Sapphire said, earning nods from the whole family. "Where would you like to sit, squirt?" Jessica asked Blake. The mage paused and tapped his chin thought....

05232.content:
"I'd like to sit with you two, if that's okay." The mage said, earning a nod from his cousin. "Of course." Sapphire said as Jessica, her, and Blake sat down in the set of seats across from Claire and Jade. Claire smiled, glad that her son and niece were catching up on lost time.

"So, how have you been?" Blake asked. "It's been forever since I've seen you." Sapphire nodded in agreement, "It has. It's been...honestly tiring." She then explained how her latest missions have been exhausting, both physically and mentally. It had become a rough time for her.

"So you decided to take some personal time?" Blake asked. His cousin nodded, "Yep, which is why I'm here now." She was thankful that her mother rubbed her back reassuringly. "So, how have you been, kiddo?" The military officer asked. "Good. I've finally confessed to Aria." "And?" Jessica asked, receiving a smile from the mage.

"We're now dating." He said, earning a hug from his cousin. "Finally! I'm so happy for you!" She said. Jessica nodded in agreement, "Congrats, hun!" "Thank you." The mage smiled, before yawning. "I'm sure you're tired from getting up early." His aunt said. "How about you two rest, okay?"

"Not tired..." Sapphire said before also yawning. Jessica chuckled, "Could've fooled me. Now, get some sleep. Okay, gem?" Sapphire sighed and nodded, feeling her cousin rest his head on her shoulder, before they both went to sleep. Jessica smiled and looked over at Claire and Jade, seeing the latter of the two asleep as well.

Claire looked at Jessica and just smiled as the two mothers shared a quiet laugh. Even though they have been up this early multiple times, the kids still loved their beauty sleep. The two women would wake them up later. After about three to four hours into the flight, Sapphire woke up and decided to read as she waited for Blake to wake up.

It wouldn't be until the last couple hours of the flight that Blake finally woke up to the voices of his family. "Blake? Blake, you need to wake up." He heard Sapphire say, causing him to open his eyes. As he looked around, he realized that...
05232.title: Catching Up

052322.content:
Blake yawned, "What...time is it?" "Almost 2 in the afternoon." Sapphire said. "We're almost ready to land." Blake nodded and rubbed his eyes, making sure that his seatbelt was buckled tightly. After about 10 minutes, the plane came to a halt, successfully landing on the runway.

After being allowed to leave the plane, the family immediately began to discuss what they should do first after they got to the hotel. "I think we should get something to eat." Jessica said. There were no objections, so the family got their luggage and headed for the hotel.

After getting to the building, it was decided that Claire and Jessica would sleep in one room, while their kids slept in the room next to theirs. The group put their luggage bags down and made sure they had keys to the rooms, before leaving to go to a restaurant.

They went to a hibachi, which was "god-tier" if you asked Blake, Sapphire, and Claire. By the time they got back to the hotel, it was close to 8:30. "We should get ready for bed soon." Claire said. "We have a lot of places to go tomorrow."

After saying goodnight, the group went to their respective rooms. Sapphire immediately began getting ready for bed, saying, "Getting ready first, because I know I'll fall asleep before either of you two get done." "Hey, we are NOT that bad." Blake said, earning a chuckle from the military officer.

"You sure about that?" Jade smirked. "I can see me not being bad, but you take quite a while." "You are no better than me and you know that." B
The mage argued. Sapphire sighed, "I think BOTH of you are bad.", stopping the argument right there.

She got out of the bathroom, saying, "I hope there's a hotspring nearby, because I need it." Blake nodded, knowing that she needed some rest after her busy time in the military. Jade was the next to get ready, allowing the mage and his cousin to have a private conversation.

"Do you think it's wrong of me to think about leaving the military?" The military officer asked. "If you think that it will be good for you, I don't think it's wrong." The mage replied. "I just want you to have a stable life." Sapphire nodded, "I haven't talked to Mom about leaving yet."

"You should." Blake said. "She might understand where you're coming from." Sapphire smirked, "Since when did you become so wise?" The mage chuckled, "I learned from the best." Jade came out, yawning, "Okay, I'm...done." Blake nodded, before saying goodnight to the two and went to get ready as his roommates went to sleep.

Once he got in, the mage began getting ready, only to be interrupted when he felt a stinging feeling in his head. He decided to get ready as fast as possible, getting out sooner than expected. 'Maybe some sleep will help.' He thought. He didn't want to be sick on vacation.

After getting into bed....

05232211.content:
“...Blake..? Blake, wake up!!”

The mage in question, still groggy from sleep, slowly leaned up from the bed and opened his eyes as he heard Sapphire’s voice at the crack of dawn. She sounded extremely concerned for some reason. What was the big emergency? Blake rubbed his sore head and noticed that his military cousin’s features seemed overall bigger than usual...

Wait a second...but that meant..!

“Oh crap...” Blake panicked. “I’m shrunken again!!”

“Relax, kiddo...” Sapphire tried to ease her little cousin’s anxiety. “We’ll find a way to reverse this, hopefully...” After scooping Blake up into her palm, the officer went over to wake Jade, Claire, and Jessica.

As Sapphire explained his situation to the rest of the Heart family, Blake began having flashbacks about his shrinking adventure back in high school - surviving massive stomps, climbing towering girls, and avoiding dips in gigantic food. But the biggest of his challenges by far was summoning the courage to admit his feelings for Aria Gleam, the love of his life. The sweetest, most beautiful girl he’d ever met.

And now, here he was.

“And now, here we are,” Sapphire concluded. Jade and Claire were no strangers to Blake’s magical mishaps, but Jessica had never seen a tiny person before. It seemed so otherworldly, and yet it was so real.

“Don’t worry, bro!” Jade declared with confidence. “We’ll get you back to normal!”

Blake couldn’t help but smile as his relatives stuck up for him. Tears of joy formed in his eyes.

“Thanks, everyone...” the mage said at last.

0533.title: Walking the Paris Streets

05333.content:
As he looked around in comfort, he placed his hands in the pockets of his jeans. He took a deep breath on the corner of a street, an unobscured view of the Eiffel tower perfectly aligned in the backdrop. Blake simply took a deep breath of the city air, and admired the beauty in this city completely foreign to him, yet somehow still warm and comfortable. His peace was soon interrupted though, as he felt a strong tap on his shoulder.

As he turned around quickly to see who had done it, the perpetrator was revealed to be a blonde woman in her mid thirties, a little chubby but still attractive nonetheless. Her hair was short, almost looking as though she had a bob haircut, and her face seemed as though she was going to try and get something out of him.

"Hey man, take my photo" She said bluntly, handing Blake her phone already configured in photo mode. He didn't know whether it was the way she said it, or how she didn't even ask, but this greatly irritated him to the point of holding the phone back to the woman, who was already posing for her picture.

"No, you didn't even ask me. Find someone else." He said with a stern face, letting her know that he wasn't going to be taken advantage of like that.

"What do you mean no? You're American too! You should help out your statesman! Do you even know who I am? You better watch the way you talk to me young man!" The chubby blonde said to him, growing more irritated and in term escalating the situation past where he thought it would go.

"Look lady, I don't know you, but take your phone back, I'm not taking your picture." Blake responded, noting how inflamed the woman appeared to be. Her previously pale face had turned red, and she was fuming at the thought of not getting her photo taken. He stood there, listening as the woman began to chant something weird.

"Oh magic, help me thrive. make my enemies change in size. This man took the liberty of thinking me dumb, shrink him down to the size of my thumb!" She said, and Blake started to get flashbacks from high school, not having any time to react as the blue light emerged from her palms and struck him dead in the chest.

It took only an instant for the magic to take it's effects, and Blake found himself around three inches tall on the pavement. He stared upwards at the gigantic converses worn by the chubby giant above, and upon craning his neck even further he saw the cruel face of the woman who had done this to him bending over, quickly reaching down to grab her prize. The somewhat pudgy fingers were quick in their motions, wrapping around the tiny man's body as they brought their victim up to her face.

"Not so brave now, are we little guy? I think I've put you in your place, now to head out. I'm going back to my hotel room, but you can ride in my

After arriving in Scotland, the Heart family made their way to their hotel, quickly unpacking their luggage and getting settled in.

"Alright, go and have some fun, kids!" Claire smiled to Blake and Jade. "I'll be in the room, call me if you need anything!"

While Jade went off to check out the merchandise this hotel had to offer, Blake figured he'd try to get acquainted with his family's temporary new neighbors. Knocking on the closest door a couple times, Blake waited a few moments before the door finally opened.

"Ah, ye must be new here, laddie!" a redhead wearing a green shirt and matching skirt answered the door. "Welcome ta Scotland! Me name's Anne Clydevale. Come stay fer a while..."

Not even waiting for him to answer, Anne grabbed the blushing Blake by the arm, leading him into her hotel room. Another girl -- a brunette wearing darker green -- was waiting on the bed, eager to greet the young man.

"T'is me sister, Bonnie!" Anne introduced Blake to her sister.

Blake's cheeks didn't become any less red, but he had no excuse to be rude. "H-hi..."

"Riiiiight..." Blake replied, despite his confusion. "I'll, uh, see you around..."

"My phone!" Blake looks around and as his vision adjusts he sees a giant figure holding something. As his eyes adjust further the figure easily become clear. Anne, holding his phone with a smirk.

"Howdy there boy-o~ Rest well?~ Ah reckon you were avin a right snooze weren't cha?~" Bonnie steps out from behind her sister with an equally sadistic grin.

"Ah reckon he was, seein how he's been out fer four hours," Bonnie says with a giggle.

"Lookin fer somethin lad?~" Anne wiggles Blake's phone in front of him and giggles as well. "Well. seems like yer a special, wee little lad. You knew what was about tah 'appen fore most other shmucks~ Familiar with magic are ye?~"

"L-let me go! O-or there will be consequences!" Blake says, hoping to sound intimidating. Apparently, though, it does nothing but amuse his captors as they laugh loudly.

"Oo~ Consequences? From a wee tike like you? Oh that's rich!" Anne says loudly.

"Sorry little lad~ You belong to us now. We were just gonna sell ya to some fancy pants over in parliament, but ah dun think they'd take a person that can poof themselves back to normal say?~"

"Aye, reckon we ought to keep this' un for ourselves~" Anne coos sweetly to her sister.

"Aye~ For, posterity sake o course~" The two sisters beam down at him as Blake looks around and finally observes the mouse cage he's in. He backs up against the wall and waits for them. The two sisters chuckle and leave to talk about what to do with their new toy.
055131.title: Scotish Magic Trick

choices: "Sell ya to that woman in Parliament, you're too dumb for us."
"Toss ya back into the canyon, see how you respond to an extended stay."
0551313.content:
"What do ya say we find out how far this little bastard's gotten on his magical studies, eh Bonnie?" Said Anne, as she bent down as to taunt Blake, simply sitting in the cage unable to do anything about his predicament.

"What would we do that fer? What good is the wee man gonna be based on his abilities?" Replied Bonnie, obviously confused at what her sister was implying.

"Well if the little bastard isn't powerful enough..." Anne started back up, before her sister's eyes perked up, signaling that she had finally caught on to what she was talking about.

"Then we can-" Bonnie was cut off as soon as she started to speak.

"Don't go tellin the wee lad, we don't want to ruin it..." Anne said, as her sister nodded in approval. Whatever they had up their sleeves, Blake didn't like it. Especially if it was like the last trick they tried to pull on him. Obviously, they were experienced witches themselves, and based on their ability to shrink him, he knew that they would probably be strong enough to enact whatever they had in mind next. He needed to successfully maintain a bluff of his power, and to do so would require some skill.

Before he could even muster up a boast of his might, the mouse cage's door swung open, and the titanic slender fingers of Anne entered the place designated as his home. Blake squeaked, much to the humor of the two Scotts, who laughed as he was withdrawn from the cage and held in front of the gigantic face of Anne. She was beautiful, there was no doubt about that, but in his current predicament Blake had plenty of other women he would rather be around, trying his best to maintain a courageous face as her breath poured on to him.

"So lil fella. Me and Bonnie have a special way of breakin our tiny folks in, but today you're not gonna get that. You're gettin the special treatment, the kind of stuff you Americans could only wish for at Guantanamo Bay." She chuckled after her statement, turning to her sister. "What were you thinkin for the wee guy?"

"For him? Only the best Scotland has to offer! Hand em over and pull down your skirt!" Bonnie said as she snatched Blake's petrified frame out of her grip. Maybe it was the foreign environment, or perhaps even just the strangers, but for some odd reason this time it felt different than the last time he shrank. He at least had some magical friends back then, but ever since he had lost contact with them. Now, he was stuck with these two sociopaths, and had no means of protecting himself from what they may have in store, and as Anne slipped off her skirt, something told him it wasn't in his best interests.

"Like what ya see little Yank? I got bad news for ya! You're not going in my lady bits, that's for sure!" Anne cackled, as she turned around and slid the back of her panties down slightly, hanging them just below the entrance to her ass crack. It looked like a canyon from Blake's perspective, one that he noticed was getting closer and closer as Bonnie gripped his legs, dangling him by the two and giving him a good view of the butt. "I'd recommend you only make us do this once, as I'm starting to get really bloody sweaty!" Anne taunted, as it became clear that he was going in at least once.

Blake didn't even get a pre-torture chance to give his answer, as he soon found out opening his mouth to yell was the wrong decision. As soon as his jaw parted, Bonnie inserted him into the large crack, Blake getting a mouthful of salt water from within the fleshy tomb. She maintained her grip on his legs, thumb and index finger tightly pressed against his shins as the warm flesh surrounded him. The only oxygen he got was humid, and smelled rank as the Scottish girls held him there for at least thirty seconds, no matter how much wiggling he did to try and escape.

Finally, they decided to open up the questioning, and withdrew him from the horrid prison where he had been for the last half minute, still dangling him as Bonnie raised her arm up to make him at eye level with the pair. A cruel smile adorned Anne's face, looking at the man she had just had kicking around from within her butt, knowing that there was nothing that he could do to prevent her from doing it again. Bonnie seemed to be amused as well, but somewhat less thrilled about having her fingers submerged in her own sister's rear end.

"Think yer ready to talk yet?" Asked Bonnie, as she transitioned to a much more stern look, making Blake feel even more uneasy.

"Yes! Please let me talk!" Blake screamed at the top of his lungs, hoping to get the point across that he was ready for questioning.

"Sounds as convincing as we're gonna get. Let the lad talk." Bonnie replied, signaling to her sister, who by this point seemed to be the leader of the couple.

"Alright buggie. How much magic ya got in you? We dealin with a newbie, or a grand mage?" She said, trying to hold back a smile.

"I'm a masterful high mage! You are all lucky that I haven't grown back and punished you like the scum you are, release me right now! This is your final chance!"

The two looked unimpressed at his statement, as thought they saw right through his bluff.

"If you were a high mage, then you wouldn't have just been drowning in my ass sweat? You Americans really are thick, aren't ya? Oh well, I've made up my mind. You're gonna be sapped of any magical powers ya got, and then we're gonna
0551313.title: Interrogation

0553.content: How about one of these countries, then?
0553.title: Other destinations

choices: Doctor Blake is in the house!
05533.content:
Perhaps another side story entirely would catch your interest?

Doctor Blake: Through a complex series of events, Blake takes on the role of a doctor to shrink himself and cure the ailments of a girl he knows.
05533.title: More Side Stories

choices: Blake’s sister Jade has a stomachache!
Blake’s crush, Aria, has a fever!
055331.content:
Good choice!

But before we get into it, who is Blake’s first patient? And what’s troubling them today?
055331.title: Doctor Blake is in the house!

choices: Honesty! Ask Jade directly if he can shrink himself and get swallowed by her!
Eh, better not risk it. Wait for her to fall asleep, then sneak down her throat!
0553311.content:
"Urrgh... Ooooh..."

"Jade? What's wrong?" Looking over at his sister, who had been seated on the couch watching TV, Blake now saw that she was standing up and clutching her stomach.

"I don't know. Mgh... It just started hurting all of a sudden! I don't know why, I didn't eat anything that I thought was expired, and I definitely haven't eaten too much today."

Darn, it wasn't fun to be Jade right now... If only there was some way he could make her feel better...

Hey, wait a minute! Drawing sudden inspiration from that old movie he'd seen a few nights previously, Blake realized that he could totally help out Jade! He could shrink himself down to a tiny size and get into her stomach to see what was causing her distress. It was a brilliant idea- with his magic he could protect himself (probably) from her stomach acids, so there wasn't much worry about getting hurt inside of her.

But getting Jade to agree to his plan was a different matter entirely. While she could be short-tempered, his little sister was quite a sweetie around him (at least, most of the time), so she probably wouldn't be entirely cool with anything that had even the slightest chance of Blake getting hurt.

But Blake reaaally wanted to try out his idea... So what was the best way to go about implementing it?
0553311.title: Blake’s sister Jade has a stomachache!

choices: Blake is Swallowed Down... the Wrong Pipe!
Jade is just barely awake and feels something in her mouth!
05533112.content:
Blake looked over his sister with a hand on his chin. He pouted his lip contemplating how to tackle this and try out what he wanted at the same time.

"Maybe it's just a stomach cramp? How long have you been having these symptoms?" Jade groaned as she looked off to the side, shutting her eyes tight as she rubbed her aching belly.

"Um... about an hour and a half? Maybe two hours?" At his sister's expense, Blake knew the perfect way to execute his plan.

Hmm... well aside from Pepto Bismol I-

"Ew! Yuck! You know I hate that stuff, makes me more sick than the stomach aches." Blake shrugs.

"Then not much I can do than offer bedrest for now. If it gets worse then, of course, I'll help but belly aches aren't exactly medical emergencies... too often" Blake said with a half chuckle. Jade glares at her brother and sighs.

"Alright. I guess I'll get a ride home."

"No!" Blake blurts out. "Erm... No. It might be a bit of a hazard. Tell you what. You can sleep in my office. I have a bottle of Zzzquil somewhere. You'll be out like a light and when you wake up, I can guarantee that your stomach ache will be gone!" Jade pouts her lip and looks to the door then back to her doctor. She looks to the clock and sighs.

"How long will I be out?" Blake smiles that his sister has taken up his assistance.

"Around 6-8 hours. Afterward, you'll still feel a teensy bit drowsy but by then I'm sure you'll feel better. It takes around 20-30 minutes for the medicine to take its effect." Jade nods.

"Suppose I won't be needing these then." Jade fishes into her pocket and hands over her car keys to her brother. "got a room I can crash all day in?" Blake sputters a bit.

"Like... a patient room? No! I wouldn't let my sister sleep on something so uncomfortable. Here, follow me." Blake walks back to the door and opens it. Letting his sister into the back. Once in Blake follows after Jade, then leads her down the halls to his personal office.



Blake unlocks the door and shows off his window office. A nice blue couch on against the glass and a small cubicle for his work, photos of his close friends and families. Jade walks in and looks around the room in awe. Blake smiles and looks on his desk and sees a photo of Aria with him shrunk. His eyes widen and he goes over and blocks the line of sight, putting the photo face-down onto the desk. Jade meanwhile is admiring his degrees and doctorates on display.

"So this is where you put 'em~ Not too shabby big bro, not too shabby indeed. She turns to face him as Blake brings his hands back to his front pockets with a soft smile.

"Yeah well, it's my home away from home." Jade smiles and eyes the couch, walking over to it. She leans into it, sighing as her body collapses onto the soft surface.

"Feel free to put the pillows on the ground. Helps with space when you need a nap. Jade nods and complies, putting all three pillows on the floor. "Right, I'll be right back. Just be use your phone for a bit. Charger iiiiiiiis over there." Blake says, pointing to it. "I'll be right back and uh... don't look at anything.. please? Hippa laws and all that."

"Don't worry bro, ain't gonna snoop around..... unless you got something you're hiding." Blake blushes but smirks.

"Like you'd ever find it." Jade's eyes widen.

"HA!" She yells. "Like YOU would have something to hide." Jade smiles and plugs her phone in. "No worries bro, no snooping for me." Blake smiles and nods, closing the door and heading to the in-hospital pharmacy. Phew... thank goodness for reverse psychology. I knew that class would come in handy someday! Blake thinks with a smile.



Blake gets a bottle and returns to see Jade wince in pain again.

"Oh hey... mmm... that thing doesn't need food .. nnf... right?"

"No, it should be fine." Blake un-caps everything and pours serving. He hands it to his sister who takes it quickly and downs it like a shot. Her face scrunched and she sticks out her tongue.

"Blegh... cherry flavored..." Blake chuckles.

"Alright, you should be out in 20 minutes. You can watch an episode of something." Jade nods before her eyes widen.

"Wait! What about you? Don't you have patients you need to attend?" Blake smiles.

"It's fine. I can have someone fill in for me. Family emergency~ I can just do paperwork and still be doing my job. Jade relaxes and sighs.

"Thanks, bro... you always got a plan," Jade says as she slips on some ear pods and watches some Netflix show. Blake smiles, enjoying the admiration of his sister.



After around 30 minutes Blake hears something land on a cushion. He turns to see Jade had dropped her phone onto one of the sofa cushions and was out like a light. Blake smiled and started enacting the second step of his plan. He had sent out an email telling his fellow staff not to be disturbed and to cover for him while he did his work. He gets up from his desk and gets on his knees. He arranges the cushions as makeshift steps and moves Jade's phone onto his desk so it can still charge. Blake gets up and locks the door just in case. He kneels on the bottom-most cushion and whispers a familiar chant.

Blake's whispers increase in speed and complexity before suddenly he starts dwindling away on top of the seat cushion he was kneeling on. Blake smirked and saw how he was successful and carefully made his way to the second step of the seat cushions when he was the appropriate size. Quickly he passed from 5'8", to 5', to 4'6", 3'4", 2'1, 1', 6", to 3", to finally 1.5 inches tall. In that time he had barely managed to climb the cushions onto the sofa and now stood close to his titanic sleeping sister. Blake could only stare in awe at the sheer size of his slumbering sibling. Blake stood right next to Jade's arm, able to see the individual fibers of her shirt as great threads to hold up the massive form of Jade's outfit. Blake could not help but admire the size of everything again. He had not been this size since ... well a few select times after High School, but other than those, not many other times. Blake turned around and inspected his office. The whole room felt so much bigger than before as if he was in some great ancient hall. Something that you'd read about in stories of heroes finding a treasure deep within a cursed temple.

GRRRRRRRRRNNNNNMMM

Blake turned around and saw Jade turn her head in her sleep

"mmm..." The giant arm in front of him moved as it rested on top of Jade's stomach, the sound muffled under seemingly tons of flesh and cloth. Blake blushed and remembered his mission. To help his sister! He inspects the area and deduces the best way would be to climb up her sleeve and make his way to her mouth and find the problem head-on. It was fool-proof!

Setting out, Blake walked up to the massive sleeve and started climbing, grabbing climbs and finding purchase against the side of Jade's arm underneath the cloth. It was like climbing a massive blanket by the handfuls on top of a marshmallow. Soon though Blake is able to hoist himself upwards and gazes upon the landscape that is his sleeping sister. The plains of her stomach, the hills of her chest and the perilous cave entrance to her inner depths, sealed at the moment. Blake wastes little time and carefully makes his way over from her shoulder to her neck, stepping lively. He keeps walking crossing over her shirt collar to her bare neck. Blake carefully walks over to the underside of Jade's chin and yelps as the landscape shakes and a sound rings out.

mm...GLRK...

The neck bulges and lifts Blake up a bit as Jade seemingly swallowed some spit in her sleep and lets out a sleepy moan, trying to tiredly fight off her stomach ache herself. Blake blushes as soon he would be in a similar situation, not just on the opposite side but deep inside his own sister. Intrigued, he continues on and clambers up onto her chin, holding onto it in case Jade moves her face. As Blake crosses the top of Jade's chin he sees that her mouth is open, most likely a result of that reflex swallow. Carefully, Blake crawls on his belly towards his sister's lips, the soft skin offering easy traction to reach his goal. Soon Blake arrives on Jade's lower lip and feels the breaths of his mighty sister upon him. No air from her mouth, all from her nose as she breathed peacefully and easily. He'd have to give his thanks to Zzzquil after this was done and try some himself.

Air pulled into her nostrils and out in simple sessions, blowing the tiny mage doctor's hair around. Smiling and beyond excited, Blake peers over his sister's soft plush sticky lip and peers deep into her dormant maw. It was easy to see why Jade had swallowed as spit was already starting to pool in the back of her mouth again. Blake again found himself admiring the sheer scale of all that was before him. The squishy, bouncy, and playful muscle that was her tongue, her almost perfectly white teeth designed specifically for cutting and chewing morsels like himself, and her small uvula which laid cutely tucked away waiting for stimulation. Blake starts carefully moving forward to go headfirst into the mighty maw when Jade's face starts moving.

A tired groan echoes out from Jade's mouth as Jade starts closing her lips. Not wanting to waste this opportunity, Blake pulls himself forward just in time as Jade closes her mouth and rolls onto her right side. Blake is immediately sandwiched between the roof of Jade's mouth and her spit lathered tongue. A resounding moan roars in Blake's ears as Jade tiredly suckles on him. Blake groans and blushes and tries squirming forward. Jade's intrigued tongue rolls and probes the tiny mage against her palette roughly tongue-handling him. Blake winces and squirms and tries to keep moving forward as spit soaks his clothes and dampens his hair.
05533112.title: Prescribed Bedrest... with a Dose of lil Dr. Blake

0553313.content: Who’s visiting Doctor Blake, if not Jade or Aria?
0553313.title: More patients

1.content:
Blake wakes up with a yawn. He gets out of bed and walks to his bathroom. He starts his shower and brushes his teeth. It had been nearly five years since he shrunk professed his love to Aria. Since then the two began happily dating. Blake and Aria graduated high school and are on their own adventures in college. Aria went to a university and shares a dorm/apartment. Blake goes to community college to get his general education out of the way. The two visit each other frequently and Aria still often teases Blake for shrinking. Most of Blake and Aria’s close friends know the story by now and have generally either accepted it word for word or think it’s some elaborate metaphor.

Blake steps out of the shower and gets dressed. Once he does, he goes down stairs, making himself some breakfast. Blake has just finished his finals and was glad to be through them. Suddenly he hears thuds racing above him. Soon his younger sister Jade emerges from the staircase and quickly makes breakfast.

“Hey shortstuff~” Jade had seen Blake tiny firsthand and never truly got over the feeling of being the “big sister”.

“Hey sis.” Blake replies. “Someone is dressed for fun.” Truly Jade was. She wore a short t shirt that showed off her midriff and preppy short shorts.

“Duh, I’m hanging out with some friends for a graduation party. A goodbye to boring high school and a lovely hello to college life~” Jade smiles as she poured some cereal and milk, eating rather quickly. “But yeah,” she said with her mouth full. “I’m going out all night after finals today. Told ma I’ll be home tomorrow afternoon... ish.” Jade smiles and chugs the rest of her cereal down and finishes with a heafty sigh then a loud belch. “Oops~ ‘scuse me. Alright, I’m out. Later squirt.” Blake chuckled, she had grown and changed so fast these past few years.

“Alright, whatever. Stay safe, “big sis”,” Blake said with a smirk. His comment earned a smile from Jade as she waved goodbye. She exits the house and gets into her friend’s car. Blake hears the familiar car of x speed away. Blake sighs with a smile, “teenagers.”

Blake was planning something special for his 5 year anniversary. Aria and Blake has begun talking about moving in together. It was scary at first to Blake but he auickly came around. He was thinking of taking Aria of a tour of a place he picked out. A small two bedroom house that was close to both of those colleges and was close to downtown should they eventually get a job there. Blake couldn’t wait to tell Aria.

Suddenly as Blake is preparing to head out a spirit appears before him. It’s the timid spirit that helped him along his journey. Blake is surprised but welcomes her eagerly.

“S-spirit! It’s you! I ... I didn’t expect to see you again.”

“Nor I you Blake. However... there is a matter of grave importance that requires your skills.” The ethereal figure gestures towards Blake.

“My skills? You mean? My magic? I... I haven’t practiced in years. I... I couldn’t even summon a breeze.” The spirit’s figure starts to get twitchy.

“Oh... oh dear. This... this isn’t good at all. Please Blake. You have to remember. There is an issue that’s coming. I feel as if you’re the one to help us.”

“Wait.... us? What are you talking about?” The spirit shifts in two before coming together, whispers seeping out from her.

“TellHim.””Heneedstoknow””thisisouronlyhope?””hecouldnthurtafl y”

“Silence!” The spirit says to herself. She regains her composure. “Yes... I house many spirits whithin me... even the two spirits who spoke with you before. There is a great evil that threatens all walks off life. From spirits, to mages, and even the mage hunters as well. We need you to help us.” Blake was taken back by this. He truly had rarely ever casted after he started dating Aria, even swearing that he’d hardly take the dark arts again.

“I... but I haven’t practiced in ages! And I can hardly practice combat spells. Especially indoors.” The spirit nods and bows her head when a few whispers speak to her. Her face lights up.

“Yes... yes yes! Of course! Blake! We shall shrink you again! You can try and do no damage to your world! No noticeable damage anyway! And we’d be able to grant you much more strength and mana as well! Allowing to cast multiple spells on yourself at a time!” Blake was even more shocked than finding out he would be facing off a “great evil”. Now they wanted him tiny as well?!

“Wait! What if this great evil finds me when I’m tiny?” The spirits whisper amongst themselves.

“That is a good point. The evil is humanoid, that much we know... you should be able to hide from it, so long as you don’t use too much mana.”

“Wouldn’t it detect a magically shrunken person?” Blake retorts.

“No, to the evil it was sense you as alive and in magical like a mouse or... more accurately a bug.” Blake grimaced. “Our apologies. So Blake? Will you help us?” The spirit extends her hand forward and looks to Blake expectantly. Blake thinks it over, pondering if this was truly the right way to go about things. He sighed as hesitantly extended his hand forward.

“Alright I guess.... let’s... save the world.” The spirit smiles and giggled. She shook the two hands and Blake felt a great power surge within him. He felt himself becoming stronger than he had in ages. Eventually he starts to feel the power well into him. He felt himself slipping, which was normal he remembered.

“Thank you Blake! Thank you so much! Please. Save us.”

Then.

Nothing.

Some time later Blake groggily holds his head. He feels the strong magic coursing through his veins and sits up.

“Ugh... and I was having such a good day too.” Blake stands and stumbles a bit, getting familiar with his surroundings. Once things started to clear he realized just where he was. The giant furniture, the decorations. He was.
1.title: A week to remember

11.content:
Blake looked around and saw a massive plastic-looking slab in front of him, a colossal wooden cave-like structure around him, and a massive plain of cloth to his left. In the distance massive pictures of some of Aria's favorite bands and a massive clock. In fact, the posters were the same ones she had. Blake looked around once more and understood that the plastic slab was actually Aria's laptop, the structure around him was Aria's overhang wooden desk and the plain of cloth was her bed and that he was shrunk on her desk. I’ll never get used to this feeling… Blake thought to himself. He looked around and saw a few littered pens and pencils. He walks over to them and feels them. Their slick plastic coverings felt the same, just larger.

"Looks like I'm in Aria's room," Blake says to himself. He looks around a bit more and his gaze falls back onto her clock and he observes the time. 4:35. That's usually when she gets here so she should be here any-

CLICK.

Blake looks to his right to the door. It sounds like someone unlocking her door. Blake, nervous, hides behind the collapsed laptop. After a few moments, the door to the dorm opens and a few moments later the door to Aria’s room opens and Aria steps in. Blake blushes as he sees her. He fawns over his girlfriend’s long brown hair and her large emerald green eyes. Her skin was fair and smooth and she was wearing her lovely smooth yellow shirt and flowy orange skirt. She strides easily across the room and sets down her backpack. She sighs and smiles.

“Finally home. Hopefully, I aced that exam. Ugh, now I get to rest~” Aria turns around and falls into her bed. When she makes contact it causes Blake to be thrown up a little from the shock. Aria sighs and lays her back as she appears to start to get some rest.



Blake rubbed his face as once he was thrown he landed on his face and chest.

“Ugh… so much for being durable… ugh…” Blake props himself up and looks at the sight of his resting girlfriend before him and blushes. He hadn’t seen her from this perspective for a long time. He had to be honest with himself that he loved what he saw. How is this small like last time really brought out some desires he forgot he had. He shook his head, he needs to get her attention. He looks around and walks to the edge of Aria’s desk and sees there is a small gap between her bed and the desk. Blake ponders on what to do as he looks over his resting girlfriend. He needed to get her attention, absolutely. But how would he get it? He could go to her face but if she swallowed him or anything else that would set him back. He could go to her chest, but she could probably roll over and pin him under her. He didn’t even want to think about getting her attention on her lower-middle, but it certainly would get her attention. Though he could go lower to her feet, that would take the longest time and he could be kicked off her bed or even stepped on. Choices choices...
11.title: Aria's Dorm

111.content:
Ultimately, Blake settled on going to Aria’s face. It seemed much safer and less perverted than climbing to her lower body! With his mind made up, the tiny mage jumped from his girlfriend’s desk and onto the bed, thankfully failing to wake Aria from her sleep. Blake blushed at the sight of her massive form, but quickly realizing he needed to get her attention.

Fortunately, the young man had landed near Aria’s pillow. Getting to her face would be a snap! But the question remained: how exactly would Blake do this? Should he scream into her ear? Or perhaps approach her lovely, enticing lips and wake the slumbering giantess with true love’s kiss?
111.title: Face Your Fears

choices: Blake falls in, She wakes up
Blake falls in, She stays asleep
She blows him into her shirt and into her cleavage
1112.content:
Blake blushed as he looked over his girlfriend's face and smiled. Everything that he had been thinking had melted away as he saw the size of Aria's beautiful sleeping peaceful face. The sheer difference in scale brought him back to his memories of meeting his giant crush in the halls of Highschool. All the bad feelings and thoughts of worry and fear left him as he felt a gentle warmth radiating off of her body. He took in all of her monumental features. Her short brown hair, her big resting eyes, her soft plush lips...

That's it! Blake was going to get Aria's attention from her lips! Blake smiled and walked over to his gigantic girlfriend's cheek and put his hand on it. He felt Aria's soft skin give way under his touch. Aria didn't move or flinch, seemingly not feeling his touch. Blake smiled and rubbed it gently. He leaned his face into her and kissed her cheek.

"I love you Aria... So, sorry about this..." Blake said as he starts climbing up along the side of his girlfriend's face. He gently placed his palms on her face and hoisted himself up and onto her, blushing as he had never crawled on Aria like this before. Not being used to needing to climb, Blake panted as he pulled himself on top of Aria's face and crawled onto her chin. Once on top he sprawled himself out onto her chin and sighed as he softly breathed in Aria's sweet perfume, her skin soft and allowing him to sink into her slightly. Suddenly a slight vibration comes from under him.

"Mmm...." Blake's world shook as Aria stirred in her sleep. The vibrations of her voice shook the plane that Blake was on and he held himself fast to Aria's chin as she moaned. Blake's eyes went wide, remembering the true scale difference again, remembering how dangerous even simple actions can be and why he had to get Aria's attention fast. He did have to admit though, it did feel kind of humbling to be this small with someone he loved and who loved him back.

Blake rolls onto his side and crawls up to Aria's lips, blushing brightly as he puts both his hands on her bottom lip. Her mouth was so huge compared to him. She could swallow him whole right now and not even notice... kind of like how he confessed to her before. Blake blushed and chuckled as he rubbed the back of his head, hoping he wouldn't have to go through his girlfriend again to get her attention. Blake looks down at his girlfriend's plush lips again and smiles. he just loved Aria so much, one kiss wouldn't hurt anyone before he got her attention ... right?

Blake leans his head between Aria's lips and kisses them. After a second he pulls back before Aria's mouth starts opening as if his kiss were some kind of curse or spell. Aria tiredly yawns, breathing in deeply, threatening to pull Blake's tiny body into her warm maw!
1112.title: Bedside Beauty

choices: Glee (She thinks this was a sign of affection)
11121.content:
Blake is helpless as Aria breathes in, drawing the tiny mage inside. As Blake is pulled inside, he splats onto his girlfriend's tongue. Spit coats his chest and drips onto his head from the roof of Aria's maw. Light seeps into the cave that is Aria's mouth and illuminates her giant spongey tongue, her brilliantly red throat, and the inky blackness that leads deeper into her digestive system. Blake is in Indigo's Apartment. He knows Indigo is in an apartment near the New Opal University, perhaps he could enlist the help of his science inclined friend to help with his newest challenge. Perhaps she could help develop a potion to help him in his eventual battle or at the very least, something to help bring him back to size?

Suddenly, before he can look at the rest of the apartment, Blake hears a commotion from behind the front door. He turns his attention to it and ducks down, hoping to avoid whatever is on the other side. Could the great evil have found him already? Blake braces himself to the floor to see what would happen next. He hears the door handle shake and rattle then hears the jingle of keys and hushed muttering. A few seconds pass and the latch far above Blake on the monolithic door turns and unlocks. The handle turns and the massive wall of a door opens to reveal.

Indigo.

Indigo opens her door with a sigh and walks in. She heads into her living room and sets down her backpack but picks it up resigning to just put it in her room. She instead slips her shoes off and pushes them where she set her pack down. In her novel anime socks, Indigo walks into her room and sits on her desk chair and puts her backpack next to her bed and the desk itself. She leans back and the chair creaks, the cheap metal and plastic holding her weight as she holds her face. She pulls her hands down her face then interlocks her fingers. She then raises her arms up, hands still connected raising them above her head as well and yawn, cracking her knuckles elaborately. She crosses her feet at the ankles and shuts her eyes. She has just gotten back from a pop exam and is confident in her score, I got at least a 95 She thinks to herself. She takes another deep breath and sighs, going over the questions in her head just to make sure. Her mental review easily an enjoyable pastime to improve her skills and memory retention. Though this hobby helps Indigo, it will seldom help Blake.



Blake witnesses first hand Indigo stepping into her home, completely oblivious to his presence. Blake hasn't felt his low in quite a long time. Blake sees he's in the presence of some of his old rivals. He hasn't heard much from them but know they know about his magical abilities. Why would the spirits send him here? A mistake? Or to get their help?

Heather, Aria's older cousin. She is attending a university and is living alone in a private school apartment she shares with a dozen other students in the complex. Getting her help could get you to Aria.
15.title: Between Family, Teachers, Witches and old Friends

151.content: Blake looks around and sees giant structures. He never got used to this scary size difference. He noticed however things seemed familiar...
151.title: Family

152.content:
His eyes continued to adjust to see
--------------------------------

Amanda Truster:

Fiena Solar:

Mariella Weiss:
152.title: Teachers

153.content: When Blake came too he saw familiar magical items strewn about. he looked around and realized he was in the presesnce of someone magical.
153.title: Witches

1531.content:
Blake noticed various potions, amulets, and other magical items around the room he now found himself in. Something about this place just didn’t seem friendly...he was now in the domain of Raven Flame, his biggest rival!

Why would the spirits send him here, of all places? Could this have been a mistake? Or was Blake supposed to actually seek help from his nemesis? The tiny mage shuddered at the thought.

Another nightmarish thought occurred to Blake. Raven had two daughters - Crystal and Gemma, right? They seemed to have matured over the course of five years, but Blake still felt uneasy about the possibility of being tortured by the now-teenage girls.

Then again, Raven and her girls were powerful mages themselves, which could be helpful in the battle ahead...with that in mind, Blake decided to search for...
1531.title: Raven and her daughters

155.content:
Two fierce athletes, both graduated high school and professed in sports. their careers carried them to great heights. Both live in their own mansions.

Nova lives near the lake near New Opal. She has an isolated mansion she spends most of her time training. She could prove to be a valuable asset.

Ariana lives in a lavish downtown studio apartment. She lives a wonderful lifestyle and parties frequently, enjoying the attention and sponsorships she gets from her matches. As well as the dating possibilities. She too is strong and could prove to help Blake somehow... if she could find him.
155.title: Athletes

1553.content:
The hexed Vex sisters.

Vixen Vex An old friend of Blake's. Once a transfer student she went on to excel in her studies after Blake and Aria started dating. Unbeknownst to Blake, Vex is actually a nether mage in disguise. While hurt Blake did not fall for her charms she respected his space, though not without trying a few love potions. Which of course failed. Vex finished high school and went straight to work, though she was smart, she didn't really need to excel in everything. She eventually grew content working as a manager for Hot Topic, living out of a small apartment in the downtown area of New Opal near the mall.

Kathrine Vex, sister to Vixen. Blake has only met this inexperienced mage a few times, Some of which have almost resulted in some very unfavorable consequences. Luckily he was able to avoid such cruel antics. Kat is finishing up her senior year of high school and is enjoying her studies of sociology and plans on moving out of her sister's place to a dorm or someplace else where she can grow and explore. Currently, though she resides with her sister, bored and eagerly looking for a new distraction.
1553.title: Vex Sisters

15533.content:
Violet is working at Hot Topic along with Zella. The two nether mages know of Blake's secret magic powers and could be inclined to help him. Aria and Blake told them about Blake's adventure so they would also be more inclined to be on the lookout for tiny mages.

Violet is a part-time student and is working part-time at Hot Topic. She hasn't changed much and is still shy around others. She is making more of an effort thanks to Zella to try and be more outgoing especially to other customers. Violet is always looking around her environment, taking in the scenery and enjoying what's around her. While she may be more inclined to spot you, actually getting her devoted attention may be trickier.

Zella is devoting herself full time to two jobs. While she doesn't need to, she enjoys having something to do, enjoying helping others. She is in the process of talking to a counselor to try and get into the local state University. Despite encouraging Violet to be more open, Zella still has only a small group of friends, a majority being family and other magic users. She is friends with Blake and Aria, Zella still is more reclusive and tends to over devote herself to her work and studies. Getting her attention could be troubling.

Violet is currently stocking the shelves in Hot Topic as the store is winding down for the day and Zella is in the back doing financials.
15533.title: The Shy Gothic Nether Mages

155333.content:
Citrine Stone after high school set out to try and lose some weight and succeded, losing most of her body fat. While she still retains some pudge, she is in a much healthier mindset and enjoys her long runs through the park. She is currently working as an upcoming entrepreneur and has made a large number of funds. She still talks to Aria and sometimes Blake, on good terms with both of them. Blake isn't quite sure if Aria has told her or not, but Citrine does seem to boast about her new-found height from her weight loss whenever she's around Blake.

Nora Comet peaked in Highschool if you can call bullying people lower than you a peak. After Highschool she figured she didn't need a job to carry herself. Soon after Highschool her parents kicked her out to try and set her straight but she only stayed the same. Her personality only soured and led to her living off of being a part-time clerk while living in a trailer park area near the outskirts of New Opal. Blake is confident of one thing though. If he is found by her, he's most likely better off being captive to the "Great Evil" coming than his old bully's misplaced desire for revenge and her new position of power.

Citrine has just gotten home from her early morning jog and is expecting a call soon about her business.

Nora had just woken up on her day off and begins her day by channel surfing on TV.
155333.title: Big Girls

1553332.content:
Waking up, you see you're definitely not in your home as trash is thrown all over the place that resembles something you could find in a trailer. Judging from the clothes that's been tossed onto the floor without care, you could tell it was a woman's place and she was very poor due to the state of things when a massive fart roars from your left and you turn just in time to see someone you really didn't want to be seen by.
Nora Comet, a bully from high school days and constantly picked on you for virtually no reason. She was bigger than most people and packed a lot of muscle on her body.
"Hey, Four eyes! Watch where you're going!" She would say to a glasses wearer as she would trip them, but on her face was a pair of thick, black rimmed glasses.
"Don't clog the hallways, Fatass!" She jeers to anyone with a bit of pudge on them, though currently she was big as a truck with her boulder sized gut, H-cup breasts, and an ass that could swallow a couch whole.
"What's the matter? Don't work out too often?" Nora sneers as she chases someone for a really long time; however, she wheezing heavily as she moved as thick, bubbly farts exit her bottom in the present.
It was almost comedically funny as everything she did and said came back to bite her in the ass as she looked miserable. After high school, you never heard from her again, until fate decided to throw you into her home.
"Thank god I got a day off," she mutters, ready to plop her fat ass onto the chair to watch some TV and unfortunately, onto you.
As you were too busy being amazed at the turn of events that lead to Nora's transformation, you barely recognized the ass shelf she sported on her body was slowly coming over you, until you were finally stuck in her crack as another fart explodes all over you.
"Whew, much better," Nora said, rubbing her fatty stomach as she flips on the television and surfs for any channel of interest.
Meanwhile, you were smothered by her ass cheeks as she continues to unwittily gas you and struggling to get some space, you finally activated your magic for the first time in the past five years, greatly shocking your surroundings.
So did that get Nora's attention or not?
1553332.title: The ironic fate of Nora Comet

choices: Smothered between or under her cheeks
Pass out from heat and smell
15533322.content:
Blake sighs as his magic does nothing. Maybe it was size his, his rustiness or maybe Nora was just too fat Blake continues to squirm, groaning as he tries to get himself out from under his old bully.

Nora thought she felt a poke in her ass but didn’t pay it any attention, now a days lots of things hurt and were sore. She groans as she leans back into the sofa, uknowlingly rolling onto Blake. Her fat rolls keeping her warm and sweaty. She turns on the tv with her remote and starts channel surfing.

Blake groans from the rising heat and keeps making efforts to crawl out. Soon the shadow of the massive bully falls over him as her massive ass smothers him tightly against her. Blake groans as his breathing starts to get harder.
15533322.title: She doesn't find you

Yokai with ice magic

Cyborg

info.brief_description: After the events of the main story, Blake finds himself in a whole new adventure!
info.description:
Several (5) years after the events of the main story, Blake invites a friend or friends over to hang out. However, the spirits have something else planned for him and shrink him! Enjoy a non-cannon version of the events after Small Bargain


The canon ending is


Blake Heart: a 20-year-old, black-haired college adult who happens to practice magic. Wears glasses, a black shirt, grey pants, and black sneakers. Kind-hearted but prone to being bullied and still shy around girls.

Aria Gleam: a 20-year-old, brown-haired college school girl and classmate of Blake. Wears a yellow shirt, a golden-orange skirt, and yellow shoes. Smart, gentle, and fun-loving. Blake's love interest.

Indigo Lee: a 19-year-old, Asian college school girl, and a classmate of Blake. Wears a blue shirt, a dark purple skirt, and blue shoes. Studious, and knows his mage secret.

Ruby Sparks: a 21-year-old, blonde college cheerleader and classmate of Blake. Wears a Maroon and white one-piece cheer uniform and red high heels. Playful and modest.

Jade Heart: Blake's 18-year-old sister who attends high school. Wears a green crop top, blue jean shorts, and green sneakers. Caring towards her big brother, but sometimes short-tempered.

The following characters were created by fellow writer K.Bonez:

Vixen Vex: 23 years old, long maroon hair, green eyes wearing light blue tube shirt with matching skirt and ballet flats, dark mage, very attractive that rivals Ruby new girl, quite friendly and cheerful, one of the intelligence student, enemy to Indigo, friends with Aria and Blake

Violet Andross: 23 years old, sorta gothic, long black hair with bangs covering her right golden eye, black eyeshadow(does not wear black lipstick), wears black tube shirt with matching long skirt with purple frills and thigh-high gladiators sandals, nether-mage, very shy but kind, knows Blake for sometimes

Feina Solar: 35 years old, Blake's favorite teacher, very long flowing red hair, red eyes, wears orange collar button up shirt, long black skirt and black high heel pumps, very tall (7'12"), very kind, warm, gentle towards her students even her graduates.

Zella Wilde: 22 years old, born tall from a tall family (6'8"), long purple hair with black flower accessory, purple eyes, wears black sleeveless zip-up sweater, long dark purple skirt, black leggings and ballet flats, one of the intelligence students, quiet and reclusive yet nice, knows about Blake's secret, nether-mage
